description: Come to think of it yalmati, I had a listen to the Isolated drums once more (only for the verses), and it sounds like Ward does use the toms frequently, but throws a snare in at the beginning of each phrase
title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath

description:
New stuff :D
- Made the guitar tracks easier to read (less switching, etc)
- Ward uses the toms in the verses and the like
- That, uh, ending on the drums was really something
- Osbourne's vocals are actually an octave higher than what was previously written
title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath

description: -Changed bass riff to previous version but with minor corrections
title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath

description:
-Changed main riff on guitar and bass
-Changed intro on drums
title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath

description:
- Corrections to guitar parts
- Improvements to solo
- Corrections to bass (courtesy of the tab found here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CoufkKqrYo8)
- Lowered vocals by an octave
title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath

description:
- Changes to solo
- Changes to bridge section
- Changes to end part of the song
- Changed track names slightly
- Moved clean fills to their own track instead of the lead guitar track
title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath

description: Fixed the bridge section, fixed a few minor errors in the bass, vocals, and rhythm guitar.
title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath

description: Vocals and bass are in key now. Added acoustic guitar for the chorus.
title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath
